description: A hardy moss species survived 283 days on the outside of the ISS, enduring vacuum, radiation and extreme temperatures. More than 80% of its spores lived and germinated back on Earth. The findings reveal surprising resilience in early land plants and may support future Moon and Mars ecosystem designs.
title: ISS Experiment Shows Moss Spores Can Survive Harsh Space Environment

description: NASA’s Perseverance rover has identified Phippsaksla, a sculpted, metal-rich boulder in Jezero Crater with an unusually high iron-nickel composition. The rock’s chemistry strongly suggests it is a meteorite formed elsewhere in the solar system. Its presence within impact-shaped terrain offers fresh clues about ancient asteroids and helps scientists reconstruct key stages of Mars’ geological history.
title: NASA’s Perseverance Rover Finds Metal-Rich Rock on Mars: What You Need to Know

description: Asteroid 2024 YR4 has been cleared as an Earth threat, but updated observations show a small chance it could hit the Moon in 2032. Space agencies are monitoring the asteroid closely, expecting new data to narrow uncertainties and determine whether the lunar-impact probability will drop or rise.
title: Asteroid 2024 YR4: Earth Safe, but New Data Shows Small 2032 Lunar Impact Risk

description: Kuttram Purindhavam has been widely discussed across social media, entertainment communities, and review platforms, gaining significant buzz for its intense storytelling and stellar cast. Viewers and critics have praised its dramatic tension, psychological themes, and twist-driven narrative structure.
title: Kuttram Purindhavam OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Sreejith Lal’s Inland arrives on ManoramaMAX with a story full of heart and quiet intensity. Supported by sincere performances and realistic narration, the movie is a touching portrayal of human emotions and everyday struggles. With an IMDb score of 7.2/10, Inland stands out as a graceful Malayalam drama now available for streaming.
title: Sreejith Lal’s Malayalam Film Inland Now Streaming on ManoramaMAX

description: Stephen is a dark psychological thriller that explores the corridors of the human mind and the blurred boundaries between truth, deception, sanity, and madness. Directed by Mithun Balaji and starring Gomathi Shankar, the story revolves around a psychiatrist and a chilling serial-killer confession that triggers a gripping investigation.
title: Stephen OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Written and directed by Rahul Srinivas, The Great Pre-Wedding Show is a Telugu comedy film that is soon hitting the digital screens.
title: The Great Pre-Wedding Show OTT Release Date: Know Where to Watch This Telugu Comedy-Drama Online

description: Aaryan is a Tamil thriller film that has been written and directed by Praveen K. The film will begin streaming shortly on Netflix.
title: Aaryan OTT Release: Know Everything About Streaming, Plot, Cast, and More

description: A 17-year-old basketball player’s aggressive behaviour leads him to be transferred to a violent school, where he guides the students, leading to personal growth.
title: Nadu Center Season 1 Now Streaming on JioHotstar: Everything You Need to Know About this Inspiring Tamil Sports Drama

description: Sarah Snook leads the intense thriller All Her Fault, where a routine playdate turns into a terrifying mystery. Now streaming on JioHotstar, the series uncovers dark secrets, emotional twists, and gripping suspense. With a strong cast and an IMDb rating of 7.6/10, it’s a must-watch for fans of crime and mystery dramas.
title: Sarah Snook Leads a Gripping Mystery in All Her Fault, Now Streaming on JioHotstar

description: The dramatic love story of two lovers starring Rakshit and Komalee, set in the scenic region of Godavari, is a movie that turns an innocent love into a war of passion. It is a movie to stream on the OTT platform SunNXT on November 28.
title: Sasivadane OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch This Telugu Romantic Drama Online?

description: Are you looking for a smartphone with a 200-megapixel camera? Models like Realme GT 8 Pro, Vivo V60e, Oppo Find X9 Pro, Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra, and Redmi Note 13 Pro 5G provide high-resolution mobile photography in different price segments. Here we have highlighted their key specifications, price details and colours to help users make an informed choice based on their preferences and budget.
title: Best Smartphones With a 200-Megapixel Camera: Realme GT 8 Pro, Vivo V60e, Oppo Find X9 Pro and More

description: Canara Bank offers several easy online ways to check your mini statement without visiting a branch. You can view recent transactions through the Canara ai1 app, internet banking or WhatsApp Banking. The app lets you access and email your mini statement after a quick login, while net banking users can retrieve it from the Accounts section. WhatsApp Banking allows you to request it by messaging the bank’s official number. These methods provide secure, quick access to your last few transactions.
title: How to Get Canara Bank Mini Statement Online Using Different Methods: A Step-By-Step Guide

description: As the holidays approach, many are turning to chatbots like ChatGPT and Gemini for travel planning and gifting ideas. Clear instructions help unlock the best AI prompts, making it easier to build itineraries, compare destinations, estimate budgets and find personalised presents. With some experimentation, users can identify which chatbot delivers recommendations that match their preferences.
title: Best AI Prompts to Plan Your Travel and Find the Perfect Holiday Gifts

description: Adobe has added the Nano Banana Pro model to Photoshop and Firefly, following its recent partnership with Google. Users can generate images and make text-based edits across apps, with Creative Cloud Pro and Firefly subscribers getting unlimited generations until December 1. The model is also available in Firefly Boards for brainstorming and in Photoshop for high-resolution generative edits.
title: Gemini 3-Powered Nano Banana Pro AI Model Integrated Into Adobe Photoshop, Firefly

description: Huawei Watch GT 6 Pro has been launched in India alongside the vanilla Watch GT 6. Unveiled on Friday, the new Huawei smartwatches are currently on sale in the currently via Flipkart. Offered in two size variants, the standard Watch GT 6 gets a stainless steel dial. The wearables are compatible with smartphones running on Android 9 or later and iOS 13 or later versions. The Watch GT 6 series ships with 5ATM + IP69 ratings for dust and water resistance.
title: Huawei Watch GT 6 Pro, Watch GT 6 Launched in India With Up To 21 Days Battery Life, IP69 Rating: Price, Features

description: Nubia Fold and Flip 3 could be launched soon by the tech firm, as the renders of the two purported foldable phones have surfaced online. The Nubia Flip 3 could launch as the successor to the Flip 2, which was unveiled in Japan earlier this year, in Japan. The Nubia Fold appears in a black colourway, sporting a triple rear camera setup. Meanwhile, the Flip 3 could be offered in white and black colour options. It might sport a dual rear camera unit, too. The handset is also shown with a larger cover display than its predecessor.
title: Nubia Fold, Nubia Flip 3 Leaked Renders Reveal Design and Colour Options

description: OnePlus 15R will be launched in India next month, along with the OnePlus Pad Go 2.
title: OnePlus 15R India Launch Date Announced; Will Debut Alongside OnePlus Pad Go 2

description: Red Magic appears to be preparing the Red Magic 11 Air as the successor to the Red Magic 10 Air. A TENAA listing suggests the purported phone may feature a 6.85-inch OLED display, a 16-megapixel under-display selfie camera, a 50-megapixel main rear sensor, an 8-megapixel ultra-wide lens, and a roughly 7,000mAh battery. With its certification confirmed, the handset may launch in China as early as December or in early 2026.
title: Red Magic 11 Air Listed on TENAA Database With 7,000mAh Battery, 50-Megapixel Camera

description: Vivo S50 series, expected to include Vivo S50 and Vivo S50 Pro Mini, will be equipped with a Sony IMX882 periscope telephoto camera on the back, according to Vivo Product Manager Han Boxiao. Teased to launch in December, the phones will be unveiled in China as the successor to the Vivo S30 and Vivo S30 Pro Mini. This comes soon after the company executive announced that the Vivo S50 Pro Mini will be powered by Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 SoC, which is confirmed to be launched November 26.
title: Vivo S50 Series Camera Specifications Revealed Ahead of Debut; Will Arrive With Sony IMX882 Sensor

description: Google has outlined four AI-driven tips to simplify Black Friday and Cyber Monday shopping. US shoppers can track prices, set preferred budgets, and let agentic checkout complete purchases. Gemini and AI Mode offer personalised gift recommendations and retailer data. The Let Google Call feature can check local store availability, while Virtual Try On helps users preview apparel before buying.
title: Google Explains How AI Can Help You Find Better Black Friday and Cyber Monday Deals

description: Honor 500 Pro and Honor 500 have been launched in China. The new smartphones run on Snapdragon chipsets and pack up to 16GB RAM and a maximum of 1TB onboard storage. The Pro model carries an 8,000mAh battery.
title: Honor 500 Pro With Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC, 8,000mAh Battery Launched Alongside Honor 500: Price, Specifications

description: Bitcoin traded near $86,900 (roughly Rs. Rs. 77.5 lakh) as the crypto market showed early hints of stabilisation following last week’s declines. Select altcoins posted mild gains, with traders eyeing improving derivatives signals and rising ETF inflows. Analysts note that while conditions remain fragile, oversold indicators and renewed risk appetite may support a gradual recovery if key support levels hold.
title: Bitcoin Rebounds Above $86,900 as Market Shows Early Signs of Rotation

description: Tesla has begun the tape out process for its new AI5 chipset, the successor to the AI4 chip used in current Tesla vehicles. Elon Musk also confirmed that work on the next generation AI6 chip is underway as the company plans to scale its in-house silicon efforts. Tesla aims to move to yearly chip design cycles and eventually manufacture more AI chips than any other company.
title: Elon Musk Reveals Tesla Is Starting AI5 Chip Tape Out, to Scale AI Chipset Development

description: Key specifications of the Huawei Mate 80 Pro Max and Mate 80 RS Master Edition models have leaked online ahead of launch tomorrow. They are tipped to come with a 6.9-inch display with 1.5K resolution. The rear camera setup of both models may include a 50-megapixel primary sensor and dual telephoto shooters. The Huawei Mate 80 Pro Max is expected to come with a Kirin 9030 series chipset.
title: Huawei Mate 80 Pro Max Camera, Display Specifications Leaked; Tipped to Feature Kirin 9030 Chipset

description: The Poco Pad M1 is set to launch globally on November 26. Ahead of its debut, an alleged listing for the tablet has appeared on a certification website, confirming the name and hinting at key specifications. According to the listing, the Poco Pad M1 could be powered by the Snapdragon 7s Gen 4 chipset alongside an Adreno 732 GPU, and is expected to ship with Android 15.
title: Poco Pad M1 Reportedly Listed on Google Play Console, Hinting at Imminent Global Debut

description: Samsung is reportedly working on a major upgrade to Bixby, integrating Perplexity AI to handle complex, reasoning-heavy requests while Bixby manages basic tasks. The change is expected to debut with the Galaxy S26 series in early 2026. The move follows Samsung’s investment in Perplexity and aligns with earlier reports of an exclusive partnership. With Perplexity’s growing presence, its new Comet browser and confirmed support on Samsung TVs, the company appears set to strengthen Bixby across devices.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Series Could Feature Perplexity AI Alongside Bixby For More Complex Tasks, Tipster Claims

description: Valve has confirmed that the Steam Machine will not follow subsidised pricing like a console and instead will be priced in line with the current PC market. The price of the PC/console hybrid will be comparable to a PC with the "same level of performance", Valve said.
title: Steam Machine Will Be Priced Like a PC With 'Same Level of Performance', Valve Says

description: Xiaomi is reportedly preparing to launch the Xiaomi 17 and the yet-unannounced Xiaomi 17 Ultra in India by March 2026, according to a tipster. The Ultra model is expected to feature a 6.9-inch 2K OLED display, 100W charging and a powerful quad-camera setup with a 200-megapixel periscope lens. The Xiaomi 17 Pro and 17 Pro Max, which debuted in China with secondary rear displays, are unlikely to launch globally.
title: Xiaomi 17, Xiaomi 17 Ultra India Launch Timeline Leaked: Expected Specifications, Features

description: Anthropic may be preparing to launch Claude Opus 4.5 as early as Monday, according to new leaks. The frontier model was reportedly spotted on Poe and in a release table circulating online under its internal codename “Claude Kayak.” While details remain scarce, upgrades are expected in coding performance and agentic capabilities, building on the gains seen in Claude 4.5 Sonnet and Haiku.
title: Anthropic Tipped to Launch the Claude Opus 4.5 AI Model This Week

description: Various US-based tech companies, including Apple, Amazon, Meta, HP, Intel, and Cisco, are opposing the demand of Jio and Vodafone Idea (Vi) for the 6GHz spectrum allocation for phone services. The two Indian TSPs want the Indian government to start allocating the wider network band for phone service, while the US-based companies want the same for Wi-Fi services, which is said to help them in offering better connectivity to their customers.
title: Apple, Amazon, Meta Among US Tech Giants Opposing Jio, Vi’s 6GHz Band Allocation Demand: Report

description: Croma Black Friday Sale 2025 kicked off in India last week, and many laptops with modern display technology and chipsets are listed with discounted prices in the ongoing sale.  Shoppers looking for models under Rs. 40,000 will find plenty of choices across HP, Lenovo, Acer, and Asus, among others. The sale will end on November 30.
title: Croma Black Friday Sale 2025: Here Are the Top Deals on Laptops Under Rs. 40,000

description: Oppo is reportedly preparing several new flagship devices, led by the Find N6, which may debut as the first foldable smartphone powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset. The foldable is tipped to feature satellite connectivity, a thinner design, lighter build, and upgraded cameras. Alongside it, Oppo is also expected to introduce the Find X9 Ultra and the compact Find X9s, featuring major imaging upgrades. All three models may launch separately in China in early 2026.
title: Oppo Find N6 Tipped to Launch as First Foldable With Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5; Find X9s, Find X9 Ultra Said to Follow

description: Realme C85 5G is confirmed to launch in India later this month as the latest addition to its C series. The phone will be available in the country via Flipkart and the Realme India website.
title: Realme C85 5G India Launch Date Announced; Will Be Equipped With 7,000mAh Battery

description: Google has taken another step towards breaking down Apple’s long-standing ‘walled garden’ by adding AirDrop support to Quick Share. The feature is currently exclusive to the Pixel 10 lineup, but Qualcomm has now confirmed that wider rollout is on the way for smartphones using Snapdragon chipsets. Once enabled, Android users will be able to share files wirelessly and securely with iPhone users, with Quick Share and AirDrop communicating directly across platforms — a first for seamless Android-to-iOS transfers.
title: Snapdragon-Powered Phones Will Soon Support AirDrop Transfers via Quick Share

description: Vijay Sales has kicked off its Black Friday sale with reduced prices across a wide lineup of electronics, spanning smartphones, tablets, televisions, home appliances and more. Several iPhone 16 variants have also received price drops. Alongside direct discounts, the retailer is extending bank offers, exchange bonuses and additional deal benefits on Apple handsets, bringing the effective prices of the iPhone 16 and iPhone 16 Plus lower than their usual market rates.
title: Black Friday Sale 2025: iPhone 16, iPhone 16 Plus Available at Discounted Prices on Vijay Sales

description: Google is reportedly working on closer interoperability between Gemini and NotebookLM. Code spotted in the Gemini app shows an upcoming NotebookLM button that may let users send chats directly into notebooks, while another snippet suggests users could import NotebookLM notebooks into Gemini as attachments. The features remain unannounced and experimental, but reflect Google’s recent push to expand NotebookLM with new AI capabilities.
title: Google Reportedly Planning to Increase Interoperability Between Gemini and NotebookLM

description: Huawei Mate X7 is set to launch in China on November 25 alongside the Huawei Mate 80 series. Ahead of the formal launch, the company has started taking pre-orders for the phone. The foldable is confirmed to be available in five colour options. The Huawei Mate 80 RS Master Edition is confirmed to pack up to 20GB RAM and up to 1TB storage. The foldable is likely to get a 7.95-inch 2K inner display and could be powered by the Kirin 9030 chipset.
title: Huawei Mate X7, Mate 80 Series Colour Options, RAM, Storage Details Revealed Ahead of November 25 Launch

description: Naughty Dog won't be showing a new trailer for Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet at The Game Awards 2025 next month. That's according to Giant Bomb journalist Jeff Grubb. The insider also claimed that the sci-fi action-adventure game won't be released in 2026.
title: Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet Will Reportedly Skip The Game Awards 2025, Won't Launch in 2026

description: Moto G57 Power has been launched in India with a 7,000mAh battery and a Snapdragon chipset. It gets a triple rear camera unit, headlined by a 50-megapixel main shooter. It will go on sale early next month via Flipkart, the company's website, and select offline retail stores. It will be available in three Pantone-curated colourways and a single RAM and storage configuration. The new Moto G57 Power gets an 8-megapixel front-facing camera for selfies and video calls, housed inside a hole-punch display cutout.
title: Moto G57 Power Launched in India With 7,000mAh Battery, 50-Megapixel Sony LYT-600 Camera

description: Apple is reportedly planning to bring "major" changes with iOS 27. The Tim Cook-led tech giant is said to be working on introducing new Apple Intelligence (AI) features and various quality improvements. Apple is expected to unveil the same during its annual developers' conference next year in June. However, the company has yet to announce the date for the event. Moreover, the iOS 27 update will reportedly bring foundational changes with the firmware version for Apple's purported foldable phones.
title: iOS 27 to Bring New AI Features, UI Improvements to Eligible iPhone Models in 2026: Report

description: Realme 16 Pro could launch soon in three colour options, featuring up to 12GB RAM and up to 512GB onboard storage. It is expected to feature a 6.78-inch OLED display with a 1.5K resolution and a 144Hz refresh rate. It is said to feature a dual rear camera unit, including a 200-megapixel primary sensor and an 8-megapixel shooter. The Realme 16 Pro could pack a 50-megapixel front camera and a 7,000mAh battery.
title: Realme 16 Pro Specifications, Colourways Leaked; Tipped to Feature 200-Megapixel Camera, 7,000mAh Battery

description: Samsung may bring Exynos back to its top-tier lineup with the Galaxy S27 Ultra, as its 2nm yields are expected to improve significantly by 2027. A report claims better production efficiency and higher capacity could finally make Exynos chips suitable for the Ultra model. The Galaxy S26 Ultra, however, is expected to be powered solely by Snapdragon chips, due to current low yields of 2nm chips and a performance gap. As yields rise, Samsung may aim to reduce reliance on Qualcomm and strengthen its flagship chip strategy.
title: Samsung Galaxy S27 Ultra Could Feature 2nm Exynos Chip as Firm Prioritises Closing Gap With TSMC: Report

description: The OnePlus Ace 6T is expected to be launched in China soon as the non-flagship sibling of the OnePlus 15. Ahead of its anticipated debut, the company has shared several images of the upcoming handset, providing us with the first look at its design and expected colourways. It is confirmed ot come with a flat frame design and a square camera deco, similar to the recently launched OnePlus 15. The OnePlus Ace 6T is teased to come with an 8,000mAh battery.
title: OnePlus Ace 6T Design, Colourways Revealed Ahead of China Launch; Teased to Come With 8,000mAh Battery

description: Tim Cook will reportedly not step down from his position as the Chief Executive Officer (CEO) of Apple next year, contrary to previous rumours. According to a seasoned journalist, there have been “few signs internally" that there would be a departure of the Apple veteran from the company. The report, however, corroborated previous claims that the current Senior Vice President of Hardware Engineering at Apple is seen as the most likely executive to replace Tim Cook.
title: Tim Cook to Remain Apple CEO Till ‘At Least’ Mid-2026, Claims Mark Gurman
